title: Harpers Ferry National Historical Park: Education
body: Harpers Ferry: An American Classroom Mountains, rivers, and human endeavors created over 200 years of significant American stories. Pioneers, inventors, soldiers and civil rights leaders struggled here to change the face of America. This restored 19th century industrial village and its surrounding natural setting offerÂ field classroom opportunities for students and youth to enter history and science in a unique and personal way.
